name: ScooterFlow
description:
The world’s most realistic freestyle scooter game is finally here. Ride the skatepark, hit the streets, boost the mega ramp, fully customize your scooter & throw down all of the real life trick combinations you could dream of within this physics based scooter game. Experience total freedom & utilize your imagination in a world where the possibilities are truly endless. Perform awesome tricks like tailwhips, heelwhips, briflips, inwards, buttercups, fingerwhips, rotorwhips, turndowns, no handers, bar spins, kickless, inverts, deck grabs, supermans, manuals, flips & flairs.

FEATURES

  • Realistic Physics: Simulate real-life riding with the physics system that's designed for you to flow naturally around the skateparks
  • 1:1 Replica Skateparks:
  • Washington Way Skatepark - Christchurch, New Zealand
  • Knights Stream Skatepark - Christchurch, New Zealand
  • X Air 2022 Competition Park - Mount Maunganui, New Zealand
  • Madrid Urban Sports 2023 - Madrid, Spain
  • Scooter Customization: Create your dream custom scooter with parts from real brands, such as Apex, Ethic, Lucky, Aztek, MGP, Envy & many more!
  • Save System: Save & load up to 3 custom-built scooters
  • 4 Camera Angles: Offset, Low Angle, Follow-Cam, or First Person - the choice is yours!
  • Custom Maps: Download & play custom maps created by the community in our Discord


This game requires a controller to play.
